                				<item>
	                   <title>Three photons stick together to create a new form of light</title>
	                   <link>https://www.newscientist.com/article/2161358-three-photons-stick-together-to-create-a-new-form-of-light/?utm_campaign=RSS%7CNSNS&utm_source=NSNS&utm_medium=RSS&campaign_id=RSS%7CNSNS-</link>
	                   <pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 19:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
	                   	                   <description>Photons don’t normally make friends, but now three have been bound together into a brand-new form of light by tricking them into acting like atoms</description>
	                   <guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.newscientist.com/?post_type=article&p=2161358</guid>
	                    	                                   	</item>
        				<item>
	                   <title>Shampoo is causing air pollution, but let’s not lose our heads</title>
	                   <link>https://www.newscientist.com/article/2161393-shampoo-is-causing-air-pollution-but-lets-not-lose-our-heads/?utm_campaign=RSS%7CNSNS&utm_source=NSNS&utm_medium=RSS&campaign_id=RSS%7CNSNS-</link>

	                    	                                   	</item>
        				<item>
	                   <title>People are slaughtering orangutans and wiping them out</title>
	                   <link>https://www.newscientist.com/article/2161301-people-are-slaughtering-orangutans-and-wiping-them-out/?utm_campaign=RSS%7CNSNS&utm_source=NSNS&utm_medium=RSS&campaign_id=RSS%7CNSNS-</link>

	                   		<category><![CDATA[apes]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[biology]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[conservation]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[environment]]></category>
	                   <description>The population of Bornean orangutans fell by almost half in just 16 years, and it was not a sad by-product of deforestation: many apes were killed deliberately</description>

	                    	                                   	</item>
        				<item>
	                   <title>CRISPR has fixed the genetic cause of a learning disability</title>
	                   <link>https://www.newscientist.com/article/2161345-crispr-has-fixed-the-genetic-cause-of-a-learning-disability/?utm_campaign=RSS%7CNSNS&utm_source=NSNS&utm_medium=RSS&campaign_id=RSS%7CNSNS-</link>

	                    	                                   	</item>

	                   <title>Stem cells zapped with radiation can protect mice from cancer</title>

	                   <link>https://www.newscientist.com/article/2161322-bats-hairy-tongues-are-perfectly-adapted-for-lapping-up-nectar/?utm_campaign=RSS%7CNSNS&utm_source=NSNS&utm_medium=RSS&campaign_id=RSS%7CNSNS-</link>

	                   <title>How Google and Facebook hooked us – and how to break the habit</title>
	                   <link>https://www.newscientist.com/article/mg23731640-500-how-google-and-facebook-hooked-us-and-how-to-break-the-habit/?utm_campaign=RSS%7CNSNS&utm_source=NSNS&utm_medium=RSS&campaign_id=RSS%7CNSNS-</link>

        				<item>
